question: This might be a silly question, on the edx page, I see that we need to" work through all the sections of Module 1A: BSL", but I don't see the module bottom either on canvas or edx.
student_answer: Under the course tab in edX, scroll down a bit to see it. I think you're looking for 1a: Beginning Student Language. This is what mine looks like:
